channel.title: Godsword hits only 40s i want it hit 70s
channel.description: Yeah.. i want to make the godsword hits 70s.. i know how to make that at npc's but i want to let it hit 70s in wildy vs other players.. and i want the godsword is slower. i want to make it only for Bandos Godsword : 15336

item.title: Godsword hits only 40s i want it hit 70s
item.dc:creator: @jc22493 Jc22493
item.description:
@jc22493 wrote:

[quote=“Mod_CubSmiles, post:2, topic:234217”]or theres anither way
Under

//viewTo(server.playerHandler.players[AttackingOn].absX, server.playerHandler.players[AttackingOn].absY);

add this

if (playerEquipment[playerWeapon] == 15336) { PkingDelay = 5; wepdelay = 5; hitDiff = misc.random(70); addSkillXP(hitDiff, 4); }[/quote]

Much better, in my opinion.

Read full topic
item.source: Godsword hits only 40s i want it hit 70s

item.title: Godsword hits only 40s i want it hit 70s

item.description:
@Mod_CubSmiles wrote:

or theres anither way
Under

//viewTo(server.playerHandler.players[AttackingOn].absX, server.playerHandler.players[AttackingOn].absY);

add this

if (playerEquipment[playerWeapon] == 15336) { PkingDelay = 5; wepdelay = 5; hitDiff = misc.random(70); addSkillXP(hitDiff, 4); }
